meanings.definition: Used to attract attention or express surprise or joy.
meanings.sent1: Hoi! Look at that cute puppy!
meanings.sent2: Hoi! I can't believe it's snowing in April!
meanings.sent3: Hoi! Did you see that squirrel doing a little dance?
meanings.sent4: Hoi! The colors of the sunset are like a painting!
meanings.sent5: Hoi! The fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of color!
